content: Hoho...!!! <style=SizeSmall>There you are! Welcome! Were you led here by the scent of the Luca Arbor?</style>

content: Ahem, why not try giving some <style=NpcName>Archiboos</style> to Yunguo? You may be in for a surprise. Hoho~!

content: It's drawn to Luca and planets teeming with vitality, which it then nourishes and enhances. <style=SizeSmall>It can be a bit mischievous at times, though...</style>
